mapper.sql: SELECT ORG_CD as orgCd , ORG_DOMAIN as orgDomain , DFLT_YN as dfltYn , RPRST_YN as rprstYn , REG_NO as regNo , ( SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(A.REG_NO) ) AS regNm , REG_DTTM as regDttm , MOD_NO as modNo , ( SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(A.MOD_NO) ) AS modNm , MOD_DTTM as modDttm FROM tb_org_domain A WHERE ORG_CD = #{orgCd}
mapper.select:
/* SQL ID : list 설 명 : 기관 도메인의 전체 목록 */
ORDER BY REG_DTTM

/* SQL ID : listPageing 설 명 : 기관 도메인의 페이징 목록 */
ORDER BY REGDTTM
